title: Pinto (Acácio Augusto Correia)
body: He was appointed Civil Governor of the Funchal district by decree of November 14, 1921, taking office on the 23rd. He left for Lisbon on February 20, 1922.

Acácio Augusto Correia Pinto: Civil Governor of the Funchal district

1921: Appointment as Civil Governor of the Funchal district
